info.name: AWH Outbound Orchestrator - Complete API
info.description:
Complete API collection for AWH Outbound Orchestrator with 85+ endpoints.

**Environment Variables Required:**
- `base_url`: http://localhost:3000 (or your production URL)
- `admin_api_key`: awh_admin_2024_secure_key_change_in_production

**Categories:**
1. Webhook Endpoints (No Auth)
2. Admin - System Management
3. Admin - Calls Management
4. Admin - Statistics
5. Admin - Queue Management
6. Admin - Blocklist
7. Admin - Reports
8. Admin - Analytics
9. Admin - Test Mode

item.name: 1. Webhook Endpoints (No Auth)

request.description: Main webhook to receive outbound call triggers from Convoso. Validates, checks blocklist, applies rate limiting, and initiates Bland AI call.

body.raw:
{
  "call_id": "call_xyz123",
  "status": "completed",
  "answered_by": "human",
  "to": "5551234567",
  "from": "5559876543",
  "concatenated_transcript": "Customer was interested in Medicare plans",
  "pathway_tags": ["interested", "callback"],
  "transferred_to": "5555551234",
  "call_length": 120,
  "completed": true
}

request.description: Receives call completion callbacks from Bland AI. Updates Convoso, manages redial queue, detects DNC requests, blocks failed numbers.
Zapier replacement - receives callback triggers from Convoso and initiates Bland AI calls immediately.
Handles incoming SMS replies. Detects STOP/DNC keywords, positive responses (callback requests), and negative responses.
Updates lead's zip code in Convoso DURING active call. Called by Bland AI pathway when Ashley collects zip code. Live agent sees correct data immediately.
Generic endpoint to update any lead data during pathway execution. Updates multiple Convoso fields in one call.

item.description: Webhook endpoints that don't require authentication. These are called by external systems (Convoso, Bland AI).

item.name: 2. Admin - System Management

request.description: Get system configuration (excluding sensitive data). Returns server, Bland, Convoso, retry, rate limiter, and cache settings.
Comprehensive system health check. Returns status, uptime, memory usage, active calls count, rate limiting info, and service status.

item.description: System-level endpoints for configuration and health monitoring.

item.name: 3. Admin - Calls Management

request.description: Get all active/pending calls from CallStateManager. Returns enriched call objects with duration, age, and stale status.
Get call cache statistics and memory usage. Returns total, pending, completed, failed counts.
Get details for a specific call by call_id. Returns complete call state with calculated fields.
Manually remove a specific call from cache. Use for cleaning up stuck calls.
Clear completed calls from cache. Returns before/after stats and count of cleared calls.
Get complete call history for a specific phone number. Returns all attempts and outcomes.
Get all calls made today. Returns complete daily call records.
Get today's call statistics summary. Quick daily overview.
Manually block a phone number. Adds to call protection blocklist.
Remove block from a phone number. Unblocks incorrectly blocked numbers.
Get call protection configuration. Returns rate limiting and max attempts settings.
Update call protection settings. Adjust rate limiting rules and daily attempt limits.

item.description: Call management endpoints for monitoring active calls, call history, statistics, and call protection.

item.name: 4. Admin - Statistics

request.description: Get call outcome statistics for today. Returns total calls, human answered, voicemail, transferred, DNC requests, etc.
Get statistics for a specific date. Format: YYYY-MM-DD
Get statistics for a date range. Returns array of daily statistics plus summary.
Get aggregated statistics across all time. System-wide reporting.

item.description: Statistical endpoints for call outcome analytics and reporting.

item.name: 5. Admin - Queue Management
Scheduler

request.description: Get scheduler configuration and status. Returns business hours, timezone, queue stats.
Update scheduler settings. Change business hours, timezone, enable/disable.
Get all queued callback requests. Returns queue count and items.

query.description: Optional: Number of requests to process

request.description: Manually trigger queue processing. Optional batch_size parameter.
Clear all queued requests. Emergency queue cleanup.

item.description: Scheduler endpoints for managing callback scheduling and business hours.

item.name: Redial Queue

request.description: Get redial queue processor status and statistics. Returns total leads, ready to dial, config.
Get redial queue configuration. Returns max attempts, retention, intervals.
Update redial queue settings. Adjust max attempts, retention, intervals.
Get redial queue records with filtering. Supports status, ready, limit, offset.
Start the redial queue processor. Resume redial processing.
Stop the redial queue processor. Pause redial processing.
Manually trigger redial queue processing. Force immediate processing.
Enable redial queue (auto-start). Activate redial functionality.
Disable redial queue. Deactivate redial functionality.
Remove specific lead from redial queue. Requires phone query param.
Temporarily pause redialing for a lead. Requires phone query param.
Resume redialing for paused lead. Requires phone query param.
Clean up old redial queue files beyond retention period. Free disk space.

item.description: Redial queue endpoints for managing automatic redialing of voicemail/no-answer leads.

item.name: Queue Processor

request.description: Get queue processor status. Returns enabled, running, last processed.
Manually trigger queue processing. Force immediate processing.
Get queue processor configuration.
Update queue processor configuration.
Start queue processor.
Stop queue processor.
Enable queue processor (auto-start).
Disable queue processor.

item.description: Queue processor endpoints for managing background queue processing.
Queue management endpoints for scheduler, redial queue, and queue processor.

item.name: 6. Admin - Blocklist

request.description: Get all blocklist flags and configuration. Returns enabled status, count, and all flags.
Add new blocklist flag. Blocks phone number or email.
Remove blocklist flag by ID. Unblock incorrectly blocked entry.
Enable or disable entire blocklist. Temporarily disable blocking.
Get today's blocked call attempts. Monitor blocklist effectiveness.
Get blocked attempts for specific date. Historical analysis.
Get blocklist statistics for date range. Analyze blocking trends.

item.description: Blocklist management endpoints for DNC/TCPA compliance.

item.name: 7. Admin - Reports
Webhook Logs

request.description: Get today's webhook logs with stats. Monitor webhook activity.
Get webhook logs for specific date. Historical analysis.
Search webhook logs by phone number. Troubleshoot specific customer.
Search webhook logs by lead_id. Track lead journey.

item.description: Webhook log access for monitoring and troubleshooting.

item.name: Reconciliation

request.description: Generate reconciliation report for specific date. Daily reconciliation.
Generate reconciliation report for today. Quick daily reconciliation.
Get existing reconciliation report. Review past reconciliation.
Get list of all available reconciliation reports.

item.description: Reconciliation report endpoints for daily system reconciliation.

item.name: Daily Reports

request.description: Generate comprehensive daily report for specific date. End of day reporting.
Generate daily report for today. Quick end-of-day summary.
Get existing daily report. Review past performance.

item.description: Daily report endpoints for comprehensive performance reporting.
Reporting endpoints for logs, reconciliation, and daily reports.

item.name: 8. Admin - Analytics

request.description: Get all leads added on a specific date. Shows unique leads, total leads, source (new vs redial), scheduled callbacks. Returns leads with categorization and full details.

query.description: Max number of batches to return (default: 10, 0 for all)

request.description: Get leads grouped by batch time window. Identifies bulk imports from Convoso by grouping leads added within the same time window. Returns batch time, lead count, and lead details.
Get all leads with scheduled callback requests. Shows callback time, lead details, status, and whether callbacks are past due. Returns categorized upcoming and past due callbacks.
Track if a specific lead was new or came from redial queue. Shows creation date, complete call history, source determination (new_lead vs redial_queue), and full call statistics.

query.description: Date in YYYY-MM-DD format (optional, defaults to today)

request.description: Comprehensive daily summary report. Shows new leads, redials, outcomes breakdown, status breakdown, scheduled callbacks, pool number usage, and top batches. Perfect for daily reporting and tracking trends.

item.description: Lead tracking and analytics endpoints for understanding lead flow, batch imports, callbacks, and daily summaries.

item.name: 9. Admin - Test Mode

request.description: Check if test mode is enabled. Verify test environment.
Reset SMS tracker for testing. Requires TEST_MODE_ALLOW_SMS_RESET=true.
Reset daily call attempt counters. Requires TEST_MODE_ENABLED=true.
Manually trigger a test call. Requires TEST_MODE_ENABLED=true.

item.description: Test mode endpoints for development and testing (requires TEST_MODE_ENABLED=true).
